mapper.select: SELECT A.art_no , A.art_group_no , A.art_act_nm , A.art_expln , REGEXP_REPLACE(a.art_reg_ymd, '(.{4})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1-\2-\3') AS art_group_reg_ymd , A.file_group_no , M.mem_no , M.mem_last_name , M.mem_first_name , FG.file_group_no , FG.file_regdate , FD.file_sn , FD.file_original_name , FD.file_save_name , FD.file_save_locate , FD.file_size , FD.file_ext , FD.file_mime , FD.file_fancysize , FD.file_save_date , FD.file_downcount FROM artist A LEFT OUTER JOIN member M ON(A.mem_no = M.mem_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN file_group FG ON(A.file_group_no = FG.file_group_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT file_sn , file_group_no , file_original_name , file_save_name , file_save_locate , file_size , file_ext , file_mime , file_fancysize , file_save_date , file_downcount , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY file_group_no ORDER BY file_sn DESC) AS RN FROM file_detail ) FD ON FG.file_group_no = FD.file_group_no AND FD.RN = 1 WHERE A.ART_DEL_YN='N' order by art_no

SELECT A.art_no , A.art_group_no , A.art_act_nm , A.art_expln , REGEXP_REPLACE(a.art_reg_ymd, '(.{4})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1-\2-\3') AS art_group_reg_ymd , A.file_group_no , M.mem_no , M.mem_last_name , M.mem_first_name , FG.file_group_no , FG.file_regdate , FD.file_sn , FD.file_original_name , FD.file_save_name , FD.file_save_locate , FD.file_size , FD.file_ext , FD.file_mime , FD.file_fancysize , FD.file_save_date , FD.file_downcount , NVL(WB.CNT,0) as CNT FROM artist A LEFT OUTER JOIN member M ON(A.mem_no = M.mem_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN file_group FG ON(A.file_group_no = FG.file_group_no) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(ART_ACT_NM) AS CNT ,ART_ACT_NM FROM WHO_IS_THE_BEST A GROUP BY ART_ACT_NM )WB ON A.ART_ACT_NM = WB.ART_ACT_NM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT file_sn , file_group_no , file_original_name , file_save_name , file_save_locate , file_size , file_ext , file_mime , file_fancysize , file_save_date , file_downcount , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY file_group_no ORDER BY file_sn DESC) AS RN FROM file_detail ) FD ON FG.file_group_no = FD.file_group_no AND FD.RN = 1 WHERE A.ART_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NVL(WB.CNT, 0) DESC
